column2: "Na Miriam nye Aaron kasaa tsiaa Moses wɔ Kusnyi ɔbaa bi a ɔawar no no ntsi: osiandɛ nna ɔawar Kusnyi ɔbaa bi."

column3: Ana ampaara dɛ Moses nko na EWURADZE nye no akasa? Ana ɔnnye hɛn so nnkasae? Na EWURADZE tsee."

column2: "Afei ɔbarimba Moses dze nna ɔdwe dodoodow
column3: ɔbor nyimpa a wɔwɔ asaase do nyinara do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa awerɛfir mu kyerɛɛ Moses
column5: Hom baasa hom mfir edzi mbra ehyiadzibuw no ho. Na hɔn baasa no fiir edzi bae."

column2: "Na EWURADZE sianee wɔ mununkum dum mu
column4: na ɔfrɛɛ Aaron nye Miriam: na hɔn beenu no fiir edzi bae."

column3: Afei hom ntsie me nsɛm: sɛ nkɔnhyɛfo bi wɔ hom mu a
column4: emi EWURADZE mibeyi moho akyerɛ no wɔ enyido adzehu mu
column5: adaaso mu na menye no bɛkasa."

column2: "M'akowaa Moses nntse dɛm; ɔno na medze me fie nyinara ahyɛ ne nsa."
"Ano nye ano na menye no rekasa
column4: na nnyɛ abɛbu mu a; na ɔbɔhwɛ EWURADZE no su: na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom ennsuro dɛ hom bɛkasa etsia m'akowaa Moses?"

column2: "Na EWURADZE ebufuw fraam hɔn do; na ofii hɔ kɔree."
"Na mununkum no twee fii Buw no do; na
column5: ɔhoa dɛ esukwankyɛba: na Aaron hwɛɛ Miriam no
mma mmfa bɔn nnto hɛn do

column3: mma ɔnnyɛ dɛ obi a oewu fi ne na yamu aba a woedzi no honam fa dada."
Sɛ n'egya hina n'enyi do ntafi a
column4: ana nkyɛ n'enyi nnwu nda esuon bi a? Ma wɔntow no mu nda esuon wɔ nseraban no ekyir
column5: na n'ekyir no na wɔmfa no mbra mu bio."

column2: "Na wɔtoow Miriam mu wɔ nseraban no ekyir nda esuon: na ɔman no enntu araa kodur dɛ wɔfaa Miriam baa mu bio."
"Na n'ekyir no na ɔman no tui fii Hazerot
column3: na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Paran sar do."
